name: FAST TechTalks: AI & Future
description: An expert panel discusses the future of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

name: HackFAST 2025
description: 24-hour hackathon inviting students from across Pakistan to solve real-world challenges.

name: FAST Career Fair
description: Meet top recruiters, attend workshops, and explore job and internship opportunities.

description: Hands-on coding session on ReactJS, Hooks, and building scalable SPAs.

name: FAST Debating Championship
description: Top universities debate on national and international topics. Watch and vote for your favorites.
